title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Hybrid Education on Power and Energy Equipment Design and Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational electrical engineering and drafting knowledge
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain power equipment design processes using IEEJ technical papers and case studies.
Learners can analyze hybrid text-based learning materials and create system drawings reflecting societal needs and technical standards.
Learners can evaluate the efficiency of design solutions through peer feedback and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
